name: SkyIslands VR
description:
SkyIslands VR is not really a game, yes it has some interactions, but they are very wonky and buggy.

Its more like a little place where you can relax, have a drink or listen to your favourite music.

A place to just take some time for yourself. 

! Caution !

  • can trigger fear of heights
  • tested and developed with Vive Index
    don't know if it will run with oculus ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
  • very hardware demanding

Made by Fabian "Fa|Jk" Jäckel
Follow me on Twitter

Asset Packs used for this project (Unreal Marketplace):

  • Edith Finch Asset Packs  - Epic Games
  • Plants Pack - Erhan Yilmaz
